attributes.title: stupid
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and it stole my dog with a drone! it crushed its elbow and split it's cervix open! i hated every minute of this app because my penguin walked up the stairs when i tried to take my fish for a walk smh. also my frog flew away down the street because of this sickening app and now i can't find it 😡

attributes.title: It was horrible I opened it in front of my siblings and they were just as horrified as me
attributes.review: There was a terrible Cheeto Man instead of the next rally

attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.title: not a fun time 😔
attributes.review:
first off, i don’t like the name. trump is a ugly fugly name and deserves to be terminated!
second off, the app is not fun. i open it up and it’s not entertaining. i almost fell asleep. also, i had to bleach my eyes after i saw a wierd looking rotten orange on my screen. over all, disappointed. this wasn’t my cup of tea 🍵

attributes.title: Nasty
attributes.review: So when I first opened the app it asked for my phone number like what is that are you kidding me this is bs no way

attributes.review: This app has so many bugs and glitches that don’t have it running smoothly at all. This app screams Cheeto Vibez.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so much and to the point where it was unusable and I had to get a new one. DO NOT DOWNLOAD! It will break your phone!!!!
